html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04362018-04-20,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectChildren's Jewellery Regulations
PrecisCHILDREN’S JEWELLERY REGULATIONS in order to (1) add a 130 milligram per kilogram (mg/kg) total cadmium limit for children’s jewellery items small enough to be swallowed by a child; and (2) replace the current 600 mg/kg total lead limit and 90 mg/kg migratable lead limit with a single 90 mg/kg total lead limit for all children’s jewellery items.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0082 Publication Date: 2018-05-02
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Children's Jewellery Regulations
precis: CHILDREN’S JEWELLERY REGULATIONS in order to (1) add a 130 milligram per kilogram (mg/kg) total cadmium limit for children’s jewellery items small enough to be swallowed by a child; and (2) replace the current 600 mg/kg total lead limit and 90 mg/kg migratable lead limit with a single 90 mg/kg total lead limit for all children’s jewellery items.
